text: Koraa, ‘he kitabisakala! Ta'oraata, injila arau yi tomalokara pratipalakara taraphara paraa tomalokara prati aratirna karaa haiche seya pratistha nakaraalaike tomaloke kono bhittira oparata nahaya. Arau tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa tomara prati yi aratirna karaa haiche seya sihamtara bahutarae abadhyata arau kupharai brd'dhi karaiba. Eteke tumi kaphira sampradayara babe niraasa naha’ba’
